name: extraterrestrial
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in or coming from a place outside the planet Earth: In those rocks may lie the best chance of finding extraterrestrial life. extraterrestrial beings
More examplesFewer examplesSome people believe that governments are concealing evidence of extraterrestrial beings.If there are extraterrestrial civilizations out there then where are they?Scientists have found no credible evidence of extraterrestrial visitors.

a creature from outside the planet Earth: The huge dome looks like a spacecraft belonging to an extraterrestrial. Many people say they want proof that extraterrestrials exist.
More examplesFewer examplesThey've even suggested that extraterrestrials were involved.ET is the story of an extraterrestrial who desperately wants to "phone home".He urged against making too many assumptions about the way extraterrestrials would want to communicate.

(coming from) outside the planet earth: extraterrestrial objects like meteorites and asteroids
